sourceDesc.p: Generated from the Open Office Document Books I've Read 2.0 (start Mar. 2008).odt.

listChange.change: Added "omnibus" tag. Split some titles so they have subtitles; mostly this happens when part of the title is a genre label, rather than something necessary for disambiguation or for context.

Started adding from-custom on "owned" tags, using the roughly-defined time periods in timeline.xml. Also started adding dates with a type of "first-read" for cases where a book was owned much later or earlier than it was first read.
